report.title: Species counts league using standard params for linked locations
report.description: A filtered league table of species counts by location. Requires the spatial index builder.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l1 JOIN ( SELECT l.id, count(distinct o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key) as count FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id and lw.deleted=false and lw.website_id in (#website_ids#) LEFT JOIN (cache_occurrences_functional o #agreements_join# #filters# ) ON o.location_id=l.id #joins# AND #sharing_filter# WHERE l.deleted=false AND l.location_type_id=#location_type_id# AND (l.public=true or lw.id IS NOT NULL) AND (l.code NOT LIKE ('%+%') OR l.code IS NULL) AND l.created_by_id=#created_by_id# GROUP BY l.id, l.name ) as l2 ON l2.id=l1.id

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: created_by_id
param.description: Limit to locations created by this warehouse user ID.
